Player History
Earned first career win on 4/1/2013...
Had first career hit on 6/24/2013, off Chad Gaudin (SF)...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/3/2014 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,107,143 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,657,143 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,657,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/26/2017 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
9/11/2017: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $4,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/11/2019 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from Oakland to Pittsburgh on 6/10/2021 (Going to OAK: RF Andres Rubalcaba, P Robert Best, CF Patrick Firestone, P Charles Barnhill. Going to PIT: P Jarrod Parker, P Sean Doolittle, P Edw
ard Mujica)...
8/10/2022: Signed a contract extension with Pittsburgh, $5,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
10/29/2025: Signed a contract extension with Pittsburgh, $2,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
